name: Icy Maze
description:
In this game you're moving around a maze, with either the WASD or arrow keys, collecting raindrops.   Each level has a different layout as well as a different amount of raindrops to collect.  Also, if you run into the enemies,  it's Game Over.  There's a level select area, in case you don't want to restart from the beginning of the game. 

Note: In addition to being able to play in the browser,   I exported this game for both Windows and Mac.  I'm not sure, though, how well it'll work on Mac.  If anybody downloads that version and it doesn't work, let me know.
